output:
  pdf_document
header-includes:
   - \usepackage{threeparttable}
   - \usepackage{booktabs}
   - \usepackage{longtable}
   
   
---

```{r destroythistag, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}

if(class(table) != "list") {
  table = list(table)
}

if (is.null(title)) {
  title = rep("Untitled",length(table))
}

if (is.null(note)) {
  note = rep(" ", length(table))
}


for (i in seq_along(table)) {
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n")
    
  if (! "character" %in% class(table[[i]])) {
    if ("indent_" %in% names(table[[i]])) {
      stub_indents = list(table[[i]]$indent_)
      table[[i]]$indent_ = NULL
    } else{
      stub_indents = NULL
    }
    cat(
      papaja::apa_table(
        table[i],
        caption = title[i],
        stub_indents = stub_indents ,
        note = note[i],
        escape = F,
        ...
      )
    )
    
  
  }else{
    cat("\n\n")
    cat(papaja:::escape_latex(table[[i]]))
    cat("\n\n")
  }
  cat("<br />")

}
```
